00042 inline string to_var_name(const vector<int>& params)
00043 {
00044   ostringstream s;
00045   s << "_";
00046   for(int i = 0; i < params.size(); ++i)
00047     s << to_string(params[i]) << "_";
00048   s << "_";
00049   return s.str();
00050 }

00052 enum ReadTypes
00053 {
00054   read_list,
00055   read_var,
00056   read_2_vars,
00057   read_constant,
00058   read_constant_list,
00059   read_tuples,
00060   read_constraint,
00061   read_constraint_list,
00062   read_bool_var,
00063   read_nothing
00064 };

00066 enum VarOrderEnum
00067 {
00068   ORDER_NONE,
00069 
00070   ORDER_STATIC,
00071   ORDER_SDF,
00072   ORDER_SRF,
00073   ORDER_LDF,
00074   ORDER_ORIGINAL,
00075   ORDER_WDEG,
00076   ORDER_DOMOVERWDEG,
00077   ORDER_CONFLICT
00078 };

00083   ConstraintType type;
00084   int number_of_params;
00085   array<ReadTypes,4> read_types;

00098 struct ConstraintBlob
00099 {
00101   ConstraintDef* constraint;
00103   vector<vector<Var> > vars;
00105   TupleList* tuples;
00107   vector<int> negs;
00108 
00110   vector<vector<int> > constants;
00111 
00113   PropagationLevel gadget_prop_type;
00114 
00116   shared_ptr<CSPInstance> gadget;
00117 
00119   vector<ConstraintBlob> internal_constraints;
00120 
00121   ConstraintBlob(ConstraintDef* _con) : constraint(_con)
00122   {}
00123 
00124   ConstraintBlob(ConstraintDef* _con, const vector<vector<Var> >& _vars) : constraint(_con), vars(_vars)
00125   {}
00126 
00127 #ifdef USE_CXX0X
00128   ConstraintBlob(ConstraintBlob&& b) :
00129   CXXMOVE(constraint, b), CXXMOVE(vars, b), CXXMOVE(tuples, b), CXXMOVE(negs, b), CXXMOVE(constants, b),
00130   CXXMOVE(gadget_prop_type, b), CXXMOVE(gadget, b), CXXMOVE(internal_constraints, b)
00131   { }
00132 #endif
00133 
00135   ConstraintBlob(ConstraintDef* _con, vector<Var>& _var) : constraint(_con)
00136   { vars.push_back(_var); }
00137 
00138   set<Var> get_all_vars() const
00139   {
00140     set<Var> return_vars;
00141     for(vector<vector<Var> >::const_iterator it = vars.begin(); it != vars.end(); ++it)
00142     {
00143       for(vector<Var>::const_iterator it2 = (*it).begin(); it2 != (*it).end(); ++it2)
00144       {
00145         if(it2->type() != VAR_CONSTANT)
00146         {
00147           if(it2->type() == VAR_NOTBOOL)
00148             return_vars.insert(Var(VAR_BOOL, it2->pos()));
00149           else
00150             return_vars.insert(*it2);
00151         }
00152       }
00153     }
00154 
00155     for(vector<ConstraintBlob>::const_iterator it = internal_constraints.begin(); it != internal_constraints.end(); ++it)
00156     {
00157       set<Var> newvars = it->get_all_vars();
00158       return_vars.insert(newvars.begin(), newvars.end());
00159     }
00160 
00161     return return_vars;
00162   }
00163 };

00167   struct VarContainer
00168 {
00169   int BOOLs;
00170   map<string, Var> symbol_table;
00171   map<Var, string> name_table;
00172   vector<pair<int, Bounds> > bound;
00173   vector<pair<int, vector<int> > > sparse_bound;
00174   vector<pair<int, Bounds> > discrete;
00175   vector<pair<int, vector<int> > > sparse_discrete;
00176   map<string, vector<int> > matrix_table;
00177   VarContainer() : BOOLs(0)
00178   {}
00179 
00180 #ifdef USE_CXX0X
00181   VarContainer(VarContainer&& v) :
00182   CXXMOVE(BOOLs, v), CXXMOVE(symbol_table, v), CXXMOVE(name_table, v), CXXMOVE(bound, v), CXXMOVE(sparse_bound, v),
00183   CXXMOVE(discrete, v), CXXMOVE(sparse_discrete, v), CXXMOVE(matrix_table, v)
00184   { }
00185 #endif

00190   vector<Var> buildVarList(const string& name, const vector<int>& params)
00191   {
00192      vector<Var> return_list;
00193 
00194      vector<int> max_index = getMatrixSymbol(name);
00195      if(params.size() != max_index.size())
00196       throw parse_exception("Can't index a " + to_string(max_index.size()) +
00197                             "-d matrix with " + to_string(params.size()) +
00198                             " indices.");
00199     for(int i = 0; i < params.size(); ++i)
00200     {
00201       // Horrible hack: -999 means it was an _
00202       if(params[i] != -999 && (params[i] < 0 || params[i] >= max_index[i]))
00203         throw parse_exception(to_string(i) + string("th index is invalid"));
00204     }
00205 
00206     // Set all fixed indices to 1, so they won't move.
00207     // Set all variable indices to their max value.
00208     vector<int> modified_max(params.size());
00209     for(int i = 0; i < max_index.size(); i++)
00210     {
00211       if(params[i] == -999)
00212         modified_max[i] = max_index[i];
00213       else
00214         modified_max[i] = 1;
00215     }
00216 
00217     // Iterates through the variable indices
00218     vector<int> current_index(params.size());
00219 
00220     // Vector which actually contains the output
00221     vector<int> output(params);
00222     do
00223     {
00224       for(int i = 0; i < max_index.size(); i++)
00225         if(params[i] == -999)
00226           output[i] = current_index[i];
00227       return_list.push_back(getSymbol(name + to_var_name(output)));
00228     }
00229     while(increment_vector(current_index, modified_max));
00230 
00231     return return_list;
00232   }
00233 
00234   vector<vector<Var> > flattenTo2DMatrix(const string& name)
00235   {
00236     // The following code looks a bit weird, but aims to maximise code reuse.
00237     // The idea is that we use buildVarList with all but the last parameter wild to get
00238     // out 'slices' of the matrix for each value to the last index. Then glue these together
00239     // and for any sized matrix, we get a list of vectors, with all but the last dimension flattened!
00240     vector<int> indices = getMatrixSymbol(name);
00241     vector<int> loop_indices(indices.size());
00242     for(int i = 0; i < indices.size() - 1; ++i)
00243       loop_indices[i] = -999;
00244 
00245     vector<vector<Var> > terms;
00246 
00247     for(int i = 0; i < indices.back(); ++i)
00248     {
00249       loop_indices.back() = i;
00250       vector<Var> slice = buildVarList(name, loop_indices);
00251       // This line should only do something first pass through the loop.
00252       terms.resize(slice.size());
00253       for(int i = 0; i < slice.size(); ++i)
00254         terms[i].push_back(slice[i]);
00255     }
00256     return terms;
00257 
00258   }
00259 
00260 
00261   void addSymbol(const string& name, Var variable)
00262   {
00263     if(name == "")
00264       throw parse_exception("Cannot have an empty name!");
00265     if(name[0] >= 0 && name[0] <= 9)
00266       throw parse_exception("Names cannot start with a number!:" + name);
00267     if(symbol_table.count(name) != 0)
00268       throw parse_exception("Name already in table:" + name);
00269     symbol_table[name] = variable;
00270 
00271     if(name_table.find(variable) == name_table.end())
00272       name_table[variable] = name;
00273   }
00274 
00275   void addMatrixSymbol(const string& name, const vector<int>& indices)
00276   {
00277     Var var(VAR_MATRIX, matrix_table.size());
00278     addSymbol(name, var);
00279     matrix_table[name] = indices;
00280   }
00281 
00282   Var getSymbol(const string& name) const
00283   {
00284     map<string, Var>::const_iterator it = symbol_table.find(name);
00285     if(it == symbol_table.end())
00286       throw parse_exception("Undefined name: '" + name + "'");
00287     return it->second;
00288   }
00289 
00290   string getName(const Var& var) const
00291   {
00292     map<Var, string>::const_iterator it = name_table.find(var);
00293     if(it == name_table.end())
00294       throw parse_exception("Undefined Var");
00295     return it->second;
00296   }
00297 
00298   vector<int> getMatrixSymbol(const string& name)
00299   {
00300     map<string, vector<int> >::iterator it = matrix_table.find(name);
00301     if(it == matrix_table.end())
00302       throw parse_exception("Undefined matrix: '" + name + "'");
00303     return it->second;
00304   }
00305 
00306   // Returns a bool, where the first element is if these are bounds.
00307   pair<BoundType, vector<DomainInt> > get_domain(Var v) const
00308   {
00309     vector<DomainInt> dom;
00310     switch(v.type())
00311     {
00312     case VAR_CONSTANT:
00313       dom.push_back(v.pos());
00314       return make_pair(Bound_No, dom);
00315     case VAR_BOOL:
00316       dom.push_back(0);
00317       dom.push_back(1);
00318       return make_pair(Bound_No, dom);
00319     case VAR_BOUND:
00320       {
00321         int bound_size = 0;
00322         for(unsigned int x = 0; x < bound.size(); ++x)
00323         {
00324           bound_size += bound[x].first;
00325           if(v.pos() < bound_size)
00326           {
00327             dom.push_back(bound[x].second.lower_bound);
00328             dom.push_back(bound[x].second.upper_bound);
00329             return make_pair(Bound_Yes, dom);
00330           }
00331         }
00332         throw parse_exception("Internal Error - Bound OverFlow");
00333       }
00334     case VAR_SPARSEBOUND:
00335       {
00336         int sparse_bound_size = 0;
00337         for(unsigned int x=0;x<sparse_bound.size();++x)
00338         {
00339           sparse_bound_size += sparse_bound[x].first;
00340           if(v.pos() < sparse_bound_size)
00341             return make_pair(Bound_No, sparse_bound[x].second);
00342         }
00343         throw parse_exception("Internal Error - SparseBound OverFlow");
00344       }
00345     case VAR_DISCRETE:
00346     {
00347       int discrete_size = 0;
00348       for(unsigned int x = 0; x < discrete.size(); ++x)
00349       {
00350         discrete_size += discrete[x].first;
00351         if(v.pos() < discrete_size)
00352         {
00353           dom.push_back(discrete[x].second.lower_bound);
00354           dom.push_back(discrete[x].second.upper_bound);
00355           return make_pair(Bound_Yes, dom);
00356         }
00357       }
00358       throw parse_exception("Internal Error - Discrete OverFlow");
00359     }
00360     case VAR_SPARSEDISCRETE:
00361     {
00362       int sparse_discrete_size = 0;
00363       for(unsigned int x = 0; x < sparse_discrete.size(); ++x)
00364       {
00365         sparse_discrete_size += sparse_discrete[x].first;
00366         if(v.pos() < sparse_discrete_size)
00367           return make_pair(Bound_No, sparse_discrete[x].second);
00368       }
00369       throw parse_exception("Internal Error - SparseDiscrete OverFlow");
00370     }
00371     default:
00372       throw parse_exception("Internal Error - Unknown Variable Type");
00373     }
00374   }
00375 
00376 
00377   Bounds get_bounds(Var v) const
00378   {
00379     switch(v.type())
00380     {
00381     case VAR_CONSTANT:
00382       return Bounds(v.pos(), v.pos());
00383     case VAR_BOOL:
00384       return Bounds(0,1);
00385     case VAR_BOUND:
00386       {
00387         int bound_size = 0;
00388         for(unsigned int x = 0; x < bound.size(); ++x)
00389         {
00390           bound_size += bound[x].first;
00391           if(v.pos() < bound_size)
00392             return bound[x].second;
00393         }
00394         throw parse_exception("Internal Error - Bound OverFlow");
00395       }
00396 
00397     case VAR_SPARSEBOUND:
00398       {
00399         int sparse_bound_size = 0;
00400         for(unsigned int x=0;x<sparse_bound.size();++x)
00401         {
00402           sparse_bound_size += sparse_bound[x].first;
00403           if(v.pos() < sparse_bound_size)
00404             return Bounds(sparse_bound[x].second.front(), sparse_bound[x].second.back());
00405         }
00406         throw parse_exception("Internal Error - SparseBound OverFlow");
00407       }
00408     case VAR_DISCRETE:
00409     {
00410       int discrete_size = 0;
00411       for(unsigned int x = 0; x < discrete.size(); ++x)
00412       {
00413         discrete_size += discrete[x].first;
00414         if(v.pos() < discrete_size)
00415           return discrete[x].second;
00416       }
00417       throw parse_exception("Internal Error - Discrete OverFlow");
00418     }
00419     case VAR_SPARSEDISCRETE:
00420     {
00421       int sparse_discrete_size = 0;
00422       for(unsigned int x = 0; x < sparse_discrete.size(); ++x)
00423       {
00424         sparse_discrete_size += sparse_discrete[x].first;
00425         if(v.pos() < sparse_discrete_size)
00426           return Bounds(sparse_discrete[x].second.front(), sparse_discrete[x].second.back());
00427       }
00428       throw parse_exception("Internal Error - SparseDiscrete OverFlow");
00429     }
00430     default:
00431       throw parse_exception("Internal Error - Unknown Variable Type");
00432     }
00433   }
00434 
00435   Var get_var(char, int i) const
00436   {
00437     if(i < BOOLs)
00438       return Var(VAR_BOOL, i);
00439     i -= BOOLs;
00440     {
00441       int bound_size = 0;
00442       for(unsigned int x = 0; x < bound.size(); ++x)
00443         bound_size += bound[x].first;
00444       if(i < bound_size)
00445         return Var(VAR_BOUND, i);
00446       i -= bound_size;
00447     }
00448     {
00449       int sparse_bound_size = 0;
00450       for(unsigned int x=0;x<sparse_bound.size();++x)
00451         sparse_bound_size += sparse_bound[x].first;
00452       if(i < sparse_bound_size)
00453         return Var(VAR_SPARSEBOUND, i);
00454       i -= sparse_bound_size;
00455     }
00456 
00457     {
00458       int discrete_size = 0;
00459       for(unsigned int x=0;x<discrete.size();++x)
00460         discrete_size += discrete[x].first;
00461       if(i < discrete_size)
00462         return Var(VAR_DISCRETE, i);
00463       i -= discrete_size;
00464     }
00465     {
00466       int sparse_discrete_size = 0;
00467       for(unsigned int x=0;x<sparse_discrete.size();++x)
00468         sparse_discrete_size += sparse_discrete[x].first;
00469       if(i < sparse_discrete_size)
00470         return Var(VAR_SPARSEDISCRETE, i);
00471       i -= sparse_discrete_size;
00472     }
00473     throw parse_exception("Var Out of Range!");
00474   }
00475 
00476 
00477   Var getNewVar(VariableType type, vector<int> bounds)
00478   {
00479     switch(type)
00480     {
00481       case VAR_BOOL:
00482         return getNewBoolVar();
00483       case VAR_BOUND:
00484         return getNewBoundVar(bounds[0], bounds[1]);
00485       case VAR_SPARSEBOUND:
00486         return getNewSparseBoundVar(bounds);
00487       case VAR_DISCRETE:
00488         return getNewDiscreteVar(bounds[0], bounds[1]);
00489       default:
00490         D_FATAL_ERROR("Internal error");
00491     }
00492   }
00493 
00494   Var getNewBoolVar()
00495   {
00496     Var newBool(VAR_BOOL, BOOLs);
00497     BOOLs++;
00498     return newBool;
00499   }
00500 
00501   Var getNewBoundVar(int lower, int upper)
00502   {
00503      bound.push_back(make_pair(1, Bounds(lower, upper)));
00504      return Var(VAR_BOUND, bound.size() - 1);
00505   }
00506 
00507   Var getNewSparseBoundVar(const vector<int>& vals)
00508   {
00509     sparse_bound.push_back(make_pair(1, vals));
00510     return Var(VAR_SPARSEBOUND, sparse_bound.size() - 1);
00511   }
00512 
00513   Var getNewDiscreteVar(int lower, int upper)
00514   {
00515     discrete.push_back(make_pair(1, Bounds(lower, upper)));
00516     return Var(VAR_DISCRETE, discrete.size() - 1);
00517   }
00518 
00519   vector<Var> get_all_vars() const
00520   {
00521     int total_var_count = 0;
00522     total_var_count += BOOLs;
00523 
00524     for(unsigned int x = 0; x < bound.size(); ++x)
00525       total_var_count += bound[x].first;
00526     for(unsigned int x=0;x<sparse_bound.size();++x)
00527       total_var_count += sparse_bound[x].first;
00528     for(unsigned int x=0;x<discrete.size();++x)
00529       total_var_count += discrete[x].first;
00530     for(unsigned int x=0;x<sparse_discrete.size();++x)
00531       total_var_count += sparse_discrete[x].first;
00532     vector<Var> all_vars(total_var_count);
00533     for(int i = 0; i < total_var_count; ++i)
00534       all_vars[i] = get_var('x',i);
00535     return all_vars;
00536   }
00537 };
00538 
00539 struct SearchOrder
00540 {
00541   vector<Var> var_order;
00542   vector<char> val_order;
00543   VarOrderEnum order;
00544   bool find_one_assignment;
00545 
00546   SearchOrder() : order(ORDER_ORIGINAL), find_one_assignment(false)
00547   { }
00548 
00549   SearchOrder(const vector<Var>& _var_order) :
00550   var_order(_var_order), order(ORDER_ORIGINAL), find_one_assignment(false)
00551   { }
00552 
00553   SearchOrder(const vector<Var>& _var_order, VarOrderEnum _order, bool _find_one_assignment = false) :
00554   var_order(_var_order), order(_order), find_one_assignment(_find_one_assignment)
00555   { }
00556 
00557   void setupValueOrder()
00558   {
00559     if(val_order.empty())
00560       val_order.resize(var_order.size(), 'a');
00561   }
00562 };

00580   bool optimise_minimising;
00581   Var optimise_variable;
00582

00584

00587

00589   map<TupleList*, string> table_nametable;
00590 
00592   map<string, shared_ptr<CSPInstance> > gadgetMap;
00593 
00594 
00595   CSPInstance() : tupleListContainer(new TupleListContainer), is_optimisation_problem(false)
00596   {}
00597 
00598 #ifdef USE_CXX0X

00600     CSPInstance(CSPInstance&);
00601 public:
00602 
00603   CSPInstance(CSPInstance&& i) :
00604   CXXMOVE(vars, i), CXXMOVE(constraints, i), CXXMOVE(tupleListContainer, i), CXXMOVE(search_order, i),
00605   CXXMOVE(permutation, i), CXXMOVE(sym_order, i), CXXMOVE(constructionSite, i), CXXMOVE(is_optimisation_problem, i),
00606   CXXMOVE(optimise_minimising, i), CXXMOVE(optimise_variable, i), CXXMOVE(print_matrix, i), CXXMOVE(all_vars_list, i),
00607   CXXMOVE(table_symboltable, i), CXXMOVE(table_nametable, i), CXXMOVE(gadgetMap, i)
00608   { }
00609 #endif
00610 
00611   void set_optimise(BOOL _minimising, Var var)
00612   {
00613     is_optimisation_problem = true;
00614     optimise_minimising = _minimising;
00615     optimise_variable = var;
00616   }
00617 
00618   void add_constraint(const ConstraintBlob& b)
00619   { constraints.push_back(b); }
00620 
00621   // Perform a simple check to ensure the constraint will not cause integer overflow.
00622   bool bounds_check_last_constraint()
00623   {
00624     const ConstraintBlob& con = constraints.back();
00625     switch(con.constraint->type)
00626     {
00627 #ifdef CT_PRODUCT2_ABC
00628       case CT_PRODUCT2:
00629         return DOMAIN_CHECK(checked_cast<BigInt>(vars.get_bounds(con.vars[0][0]).lower_bound)*
00630                      checked_cast<BigInt>(vars.get_bounds(con.vars[0][0]).lower_bound))
00631         &&
00632         DOMAIN_CHECK(checked_cast<BigInt>(vars.get_bounds(con.vars[0][0]).upper_bound)*
00633                      checked_cast<BigInt>(vars.get_bounds(con.vars[0][0]).upper_bound));
00634 #endif
00635 #ifdef CT_POW_ABC
00636       case CT_POW:
00637       {
00638         BigInt a = checked_cast<BigInt>(vars.get_bounds(con.vars[0][0]).upper_bound);
00639         BigInt b = checked_cast<BigInt>(vars.get_bounds(con.vars[0][1]).upper_bound);
00640         BigInt out = 1;
00641         for(int i = 0; i < b; ++i)
00642         {
00643           out *= a;
00644           if(!DOMAIN_CHECK(out))
00645             return false;
00646         }
00647         return true;
00648       }
00649 #endif
00650 
00651       default:
00652         return true;
00653     }
00654     // This should be unreachable.
00655     throw parse_exception("Internal Error - Constraint has not had a check implemented to ensure\n"
00656                           "The values given will not cause integer overflow.");
00657 
00658   }
00659 
00660   void addUnnamedTableSymbol(TupleList* tuplelist)
00661   {
00662     if(table_nametable.count(tuplelist) != 0)
00663       throw parse_exception("Unnamed Tuplelist double registered!");
00664     int pos = table_symboltable.size();
00665     while( table_symboltable.count("_Unnamed__" + pos) != 0)
00666       pos++;
00667 
00668     table_symboltable["_Unnamed__" + to_string(pos) + "_"] = tuplelist;
00669     table_nametable[tuplelist] = "_Unnamed__" + to_string(pos) + "_";
00670   }
00671 
00672   void addTableSymbol(string name, TupleList* tuplelist)
00673   {
00674     if(table_symboltable.count(name) != 0)
00675       throw parse_exception("Tuplename '"+name+"' already in use");
00676     if(table_nametable.count(tuplelist) != 0)
00677       throw parse_exception("Named tuplelist double registered!");
00678     table_symboltable[name] = tuplelist;
00679     table_nametable[tuplelist] = name;
00680   }
00681 
00682   TupleList* getTableSymbol(string name) const
00683   {
00684     map<string, TupleList*>::const_iterator it = table_symboltable.find(name);
00685     if(it == table_symboltable.end())
00686       throw parse_exception("Undefined tuplelist: '" + name + "'");
00687     return it->second;
00688   }
00689 
00690   string getTableName(TupleList* tuples) const
00691   {
00692     map<TupleList*, string>::const_iterator it = table_nametable.find(tuples);
00693     if(it == table_nametable.end())
00694       throw parse_exception("Undefined tuplelist: '" + to_string(size_t(tuples)) + "'");
00695     return it->second;
00696   }
00697 
00698   void addGadgetSymbol(string name, shared_ptr<CSPInstance> gadget)
00699   {
00700     if(gadgetMap.count(name) != 0)
00701       throw parse_exception("Gadget name "+ name + " already in use.");
00702     gadgetMap[name] = gadget;
00703   }
00704 
00705   shared_ptr<CSPInstance> getGadgetSymbol(string name)
00706   {
00707     map<string, shared_ptr<CSPInstance> >::iterator it = gadgetMap.find(name);
00708     if(it == gadgetMap.end())
00709       throw parse_exception("Undefined gadget name '" + name + "'");
00710     return it->second;
00711   }
00712 
00713   void add_variable_names()
00714   {
00715     if(vars.symbol_table.empty())
00716     {
00717       // This was a MINION 1 or MINION 2 input file. Let's fix it!
00718       vector<Var> all_vars = vars.get_all_vars();
00719 
00720       for(int i = 0; i < all_vars.size(); ++i)
00721         vars.addSymbol("x" + to_string(i), all_vars[i]);
00722     }
00723 
00724     if(sym_order.empty())
00725       sym_order = vars.get_all_vars();
00726   }
00727 };
00728 
00729 }
00730 
00731 extern ConstraintDef constraint_list[];
00732 extern int num_of_constraints;
00733 
00734 inline ConstraintDef* get_constraint(ConstraintType t)
00735 {
00736   for(int i = 0; i < num_of_constraints; ++i)
00737   {
00738     if(constraint_list[i].type == t)
00739       return constraint_list + i;
00740   }
00741 
00742   D_FATAL_ERROR("Constraint not found");
00743 }

00747 #endif
